title: AI Integration and Automation Intern
description:
About Us:

Synthesys is an AI telecommunications company reshaping how businesses handle inbound and outbound phone calls using voice automation. We help companies replace human phone reps in customer service and sales, with autonomous intelligent voice systems that sound real, respond instantly, and work 24/7 — in over 32+ languages.

As we scale across verticals like real estate, healthcare, finance, and travel, we’re hiring a technical-minded intern to help us build, deploy, and test our next-generation voice systems.
 

Role Overview:

We’re looking for a tech-savvy, detail-obsessed AI Integration Intern to support our operations and fulfillment team. You’ll work alongside our management team to build automation workflows, test voice logic flows, configure customer integrations, and help deploy our voice AI (aka “Synthesys”) for into real businesses

This is an execution-first, fast-paced role for someone interested in real-world AI implementation, no-code tools, and systems thinking.

 

What You’ll Do:

  • Configure and test AI-powered voice flows (using GPT + voice APIs)
  • Set up client accounts in CRM platforms like GoHighLevel or Close
  • Build Zapier-style integrations to connect CRM, calendars, and call tools
  • Document SOPs and workflow logic to support future automation
  • Perform QA testing on live call flows and make improvements
  • Collaborate with the COO on delivery timelines and operational processes
  • Help build the backend engine behind a 7-figure AI startup


 

You’re a Fit If You:

  • Are highly detail-oriented and love following logical systems
  • Enjoy working with automation tools like Zapier, Make, or GoHighLevel
  • Have a basic understanding of CRM workflows, customer journeys, or sales logic
  • Have used ChatGPT or other AI tools and want to learn how to apply them professionally
  • Are hungry to grow, learn fast, and contribute to real-world deployments
  • Can follow SOPs, ask smart questions, and take ownership of projects
  • Bonus: You have experience with Airtable, APIs, prompt engineering, or voice AI


 

What You’ll Gain:

  • Real operational experience at a fast-scaling AI software company
  • Mentorship directly from a multi 7 figure founder & serial entrepreneur
  • A chance to help launch real client systems across enterprise companies
  • Clear documentation of your work for resume/portfolio
  • Flexible hours, remote work, and the potential to go full-time after
  • Priority consideration for a full-time Systems, Product, or Technical Ops role

 

Only applicants who follow our LinkedIn page will be considered.
Follow Synthesys on LinkedIn →

 

We’re looking for people who take initiative and genuinely want to be part of what we’re building.
